snippet: The journalist, Clare Rewcastle Brown, is the sister-in-law of former Prime Minister Gordon Brown of Britain and the founder of news outlets that have taken on the Malaysian government.
abstract: Malaysian authorities deny entry to leading opposition journalist Clare Rewcastle Brown, sister-in-law to former British Prime Min Gordon Brown; Brown is founder of two news outlets that have taken on Malaysian government on a number of issues.
lead_paragraph: The journalist, Clare Rewcastle Brown, is the sister-in-law of former Prime Minister Gordon Brown of Britain and the founder of news outlets that have taken on the Malaysian government.
